Method Summary
 void init(WebApplication application)
          Called after vraptor.xml has been completely parsed to give a chance for this plugin to do something in the web application
 

Method Detail

init

void init(WebApplication application)
          throws VRaptorException
Called after vraptor.xml has been completely parsed to give a chance for this plugin to do something in the web application

Parameters:
application - the web application
Throws:
VRaptorException - some problem that might occur, stops system startup
